hero.headline: NFC Digital Visiting/Business Cards
hero.subLine: Introducing DigIT-Hack Card, a revolutionary smart digital visiting cum business card that allows you to exchange contact, collect data, and direct your potential customer, guest, or attendee to the info they need to know!

blocks.title: What is NFC technology ?
blocks.content: Near-field communication refers to a set of wireless communication protocols that allows two smart phones to communicate within a few centimetres of each other.

blocks.title: What is the DigIT-Hack Digital Visiting/Business Card and how does it work?
blocks.content: DigIT-Hack card is a smart card with NFC (Near Field Communication) technology that allows you to share your contact information as well as product and service information with the tap of any NFC enabled smart phone. It is compatible with both IOS/Android smartphones. And, for Non-NFC smartphones, there will be a QR code to quickly share information.
